values: 淋浴；淋浴设备；阵雨；阵雪；送礼会；流星雨；一连串（事物）；一大批；一群乌合之众；一群笨蛋
（洗）淋浴；抛撒；倾盆而下；使纷纷降落；（用水）冲洗；浇灌；（礼物、祝福等）大量赠予；使洒落；使涌现

word_group.brief_definition: 淋浴头；莲蓬式喷嘴；淋浴花洒
新娘送礼会；准新娘聚会；新娘花洒会
淋浴水；淋浴用水；洗澡水
淋浴时间；该洗澡了；洗澡时间

bilingual.source: It's not always better to take a shower than a bath.
bilingual.target: 洗淋浴不一定比泡澡好。

bilingual.source: You should turn off the shower when you're washing your hair.
bilingual.target: 你洗头时应该关掉淋浴。

bilingual.source: I like to sing in the shower.
bilingual.target: 我喜欢在淋浴器下唱歌。

bilingual.source: She likes to sing in the shower.
He dropped the soap in the shower.

bilingual.target: 我们需要一个新的淋浴喷头。

list.abstract: Shower（英[ˈʃaʊə]，美[ˈʃaʊər]），英语单词，作名词用，为阵雨；冰雹的一阵；阵雪。作动词用，为雨点般落下；淋浴；倾注。短语搭配有take a shower（洗澡；淋浴），例句为“Many hostels (小旅社) don't provide shampoo and shower gel.（许多旅馆不提供洗发水和沐浴露。）” Shower名词类近义词有blast、flood，不及物动词类近义词有have a bath，showers为Shower的复数形式和第三人称单数。
Shower是美籍墨西哥裔歌手Becky G演唱的一首歌曲。

yingyinNormal.en: We'll do it in the shower. That's good. Won't fall asleep in the big fancy shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们要边淋浴边做，超爽。可别在豪华淋浴间睡着了。

yingyinNormal.en: Girl, why didn't you tell me a shower could be this good?
yingyinNormal.zh: 姐妹，你为什么从来没告诉我淋浴可以这么舒服？

yingyinNormal.en: It was either that or a bag of Oreos. So I chose a shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要么淋浴，要么就去吃一袋奥利奥饼干，于是我选择去冲个澡。

yingyinNormal.en: And I was in the shower along time. And as I was in the shower the words of an old hymn came to me, you may not know it. It's "By and by, when the morning comes".
yingyinNormal.zh: 在我淋浴的时候，一首古老的赞美诗闪过脑海，你们可能没听过这个“耐心等待，曙光终将到来。”

yingyinNormal.en: Max, what are we gonna do without a working shower? Where will I cry? And where will I hide from you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 麦克斯，我们家的淋浴坏了该怎么办？我以后还能去哪里哭啊？我以后也不知道去哪里躲你了？

yingyinNormal.en: And we'll order room service before. That way we will finish our loud adult shower sex just as room service arrives and we will slip on robes and eat burgers. No, wait spaghetti. No, I like burgers better. We will eat burgers in bed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在此之前我们得先叫客房服务。这样一来，在结束成人式淋浴放荡性爱后，正好来客房服务，。我们就可以穿着浴袍啃汉堡，不，慢着，意大利面。不，我还是喜欢汉堡。我们要躺在床上啃汉堡。

yingyinNormal.en: So when can we have this shower?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们何时能开这个告别单身女子派对？

yingyinNormal.en: How was your shower? It was good, good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冲凉可舒爽？不错，不错。

yingyinNormal.en: But your hair looks disgusting. Did you even shower?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但你的头发很恶，你有没洗澡啊？

yingyinNormal.en: As for the shower capacity issue, I cite addendum J.
yingyinNormal.zh: 至于浴室容量问题，我引用附录J。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey. I've got a great idea for party favors for the shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我有个派对主题的好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I did spend a lot of my shower time with Lieutenant Uhura.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的浴室"自乐"时间有不少是跟乌乎拉通讯官度过的。

yingyinNormal.en: I won first place for this. So did I. I threw Jenny's baby shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这作品让我得了第一。我也是。我为珍妮举办了迎婴派对。

yingyinNormal.en: One of them could end up in the backseat of her car, or her shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可以扔一个进她的汽车后座，或是她的浴室。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. I slipped in the shower, and I think I dislocated my shoulder.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好。我在浴缸里滑倒了，我觉得肩膀好像脱臼了。

yingyinNormal.en: So I got off the phone with President Faust, and I went to the shower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 于是我挂断了福斯特校长的电话，然后去洗了个澡。

yingyinNormal.en: FYI, bottomless shaving cream in the shower. Gave myself a Santa beard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 仅供参考，浴室里有下体除毛膏，我刚给自己弄了圣诞老人胡的造型。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, I got to shower. You guys, make yourselves comfortable. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，我得去洗澡了，你们自己好好玩吧。好的。

yingyinNormal.en: And they live together and shower together and have naked pillow fights?
yingyinNormal.zh: 她们住在一起，一同沐浴，还裸体枕头大战。

yingyinNormal.en: I had to take another shower. It wasn't enough. Nothing will ever be enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 害我得重洗了一次澡，但洗了也没用，洗得了身子，洗不去创伤。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 淋浴; 淋浴器; 淋浴间
阵雨; 阵雨般的东西

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 淋浴; 淋浴器; 淋浴间

examination_example.sentence: It gives parents time to have a <highlight>shower</highlight>, do housework or simply have a break from their child.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它让父母有时间洗个澡，做家务，或者只是离开孩子休息一下。

sense_info_list.zh: 阵雨; 阵雨般的东西

examination_example.sentence: How long was the man in the <highlight>shower</highlight>?
We sleep in a tent, cooked over an open fire, and walked a long distance to take the <highlight>shower</highlight> and use the bathroom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们睡在帐篷里，在篝火上做饭，走了很长一段路去洗澡和上厕所。

examination_example.sentence: Some light <highlight>showers</highlight> have been forecast since last month, but all of them have been effective in surrounding areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自上个月以来，预测会有一些小阵雨，但所有这些阵雨都在周边地区有效。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 淋浴头；莲蓬式喷嘴；淋浴花洒

examination_example.sentence: But he said, “No, my mom died in the <highlight>shower</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他说：“不，我妈妈是在洗澡时死的。”

examination_example.sentence: A lot of water is needed for a <highlight>shower</highlight>.
<highlight>Shower</highlight> every day, brush your and wash your hair.
